list.title: IELTS
list.description: An intensive course for IELTS preparation. Focused on all sections of the exam: reading, listening, writing, speaking, and improving time management.
features: Program tailored to the IELTS exam

list.title: Kids
list.description: The course aims to inspire children to study and learn English. Classes are conducted in a game format using Kahoot and Duolingo.

list.question: How does the learning process work?
list.answer: The learning is conducted online via Google Meets

list.question: What do I need for the lessons?
list.answer: All you need is internet access, a phone, laptop, or computer

list.question: Do I need books?
list.answer: No, all necessary materials are stored in the cloud, available 24/7

list.question: When will I be able to speak?
list.answer: Our students start using simple sentences during the first month of study

list.question: What if I don't know my level?
list.answer: During the trial lesson, the teacher will assess your level using a test

list.question: How professional are the teachers?
list.answer: Minimum requirements: IELTS 8, CEFR C1. Additionally, they are assessed by us separately
